seg.source: 警方使用催泪瓦斯和橡胶子弹驱逐抗议的巴西学生
seg.translation: The police used tear gas and rubber bullets to disperse the protesting Brazilian students.
Police use tear gas and rubber bullets to expel protesting Brazilian students
Police use tear gas and rubber bullets to evict Brazilian students protesting

seg.source: 周四，在巴西圣保罗，学生在抗议政府公共教育体系改革的过程中与警方发生了冲突。
seg.translation: On Thursday, at São Paulo Brazil, students clashed with the police while protesting against the government over public educational system reform.
In São Paulo, Brazil, in Thursday, students clashed with police over the process of protesting the reform of the Government's public education system.
On Thursday, in Sao Paulo, Brazil, students clashed with police during a protest against reforms to the government's public education system.

seg.source: 警方使用催泪瓦斯和橡胶子弹驱逐抗议者。
seg.translation: The police used tear gas and rubber bullets to disperse the protesters.
Police used tear gas and rubber bullets to expel protesters.
Police used tear gas and rubber bullets to evict protesters.

seg.source: 此次事件的起因是执法部门官员试图驱散学生，因此警方使用了橡胶子弹和催泪瓦斯。
seg.translation: This incident was triggered by law enforcement officers attempting to disperse the students. Therefore, the police used rubber bullets and tear gas.
The cause of the incident was the attempt by law enforcement officials to disperse the students, so the police used rubber bullets and tear gas.
The incident began when law enforcement officials tried to disperse the students, so police used rubber bullets and tear gas.

seg.source: 几百名学生参加了此次游行，表达了他们对这些方案的不满。
seg.translation: Hundreds of students took part in the protest to express their dissatisfaction with these plans.
Hundreds of of students took part in the parade, expressing their dissatisfaction with the plans.
Several hundred students took part in the march to express their dissatisfaction with the programs.

seg.source: 为了节省资金，圣保罗州州长奥克明计划关闭100所公立学校，30万名学生将转校。
seg.translation: To save funds, Governor Alckmin of the State of São Paulo made plans to shut down 100 public schools. A total of 300,000 students will be transferred elsewhere.
To save money, Estado De Sao Paulo Governor Ockming plans to close 100 public schools and 300,000 students will be transferred to school.
In an effort to save money, the governor of São Paulo state, Okmin, plans to close 100 public schools and 300,000 students will switch schools.

seg.source: 一些参加抗议的学生通过墙上的涂鸦表达了对临时总统米歇尔·特梅尔的不满。
seg.translation: Some students who took part in the protest expressed their dissatisfaction with interim president Michel Temer by drawing graffiti on the wall.
Some protesting students expressed their dissatisfaction with the temporary President 米歇尔·特梅尔 through graffiti on the wall.
Some of the students who took part in the protest expressed their displeasure with interim President Michel Temer through graffiti on the wall.

seg.source: 就在最近的一次抗议发生前几天，抗议者集体走上街头，支持被国家参议院弹劾的总统迪尔玛·罗塞夫。
seg.translation: Just a few days before the latest protest, the protesters took the to street in force to support President Dilma Rousseff who had been impeached by the Senate of the country.
Just a few days before the recent protests, protesters collectively took to the streets to support President Dilma, who was impeached by the state Senate.
The latest protest comes just days after protesters took to the streets in support of President Dilma Rousseff, who has been impeached by the state Senate.
